p:
Vero-81 cells (ATCC CCL-81) were maintained in DMEM medium (Gibco) + 1% non-essential amino acids, 5% fetal bovine serum, streptomycin (100 µg per ml), and penicillin (100 U per ml) at 37 °C with 5% CO 2. Suspension adapted EXPI293 cells (ThermoFisher) were cultured in EXPI293 expression medium (Life Technologies). ZIKV strain H/PF/2013 was grown in Vero cells and titered by focus-forming assay using flavivirus mAb E60
26, 27 .
